article_title: How Baptist Health benefits from tax exemption
article_text:
Baptist Health South Florida is the area’s largest healthcare provider and employer

The tax-exempt healthcare system spent $317 million to help the community in 2014

It’s also amassing a fortune, including $3 billion in financial reserves last year

article_metadata.news-keywords: nonprofit hospitals, uninsured, community benefit, Baptist Health South Florida, Mount Sinai Medical Center, Miami, Medicaid, taxes
article_metadata.description: Baptist Health South Florida is a Miami-Dade success story.
